version_description:
Hello Solitaire fans!
Thank you for your amazing feedback! We are always trying to improve the playing experience to make the number 1 free card game even better!
What's​ new?
- New, and challenging games have been added to our huge collection of decks.
- Better support for iPhoneX / iPads
- Minor bug fixes.
- Performance improvements - To make the ​game smaller and faster than ever!

Have Fun!

And as always, if you like the game please give us 5 Stars!

Hello Solitaire fans!
Another update coming your way. Why? Because we are always trying to make the # 1 free card game even better!

Some of your 5-star reviews:
"The game can be challenging--I guess I am addicted!!!!!" - Bootycycle
"The game just feels and looks right. Thank you!" - Sugrftb
"Perfect for when I’m looking for something to exercise my brain or just when I’m bored and wanna do something. No faults. Couldn’t ask for much more!" - ErinFoister

What's​ new?
- New games have been added to our huge collection of decks.
- Minor bug fixes.
- Performance improvements - To make the ​game smaller and faster than ever!

Have Fun!

And as always, if you like the game please give us 5 Stars!

Hello Solitaire fans! Can you feel the holidays approaching? we can!
The #1 Solitaire game keeps getting better and better!

What's​ new?
- New games have been added to our huge collection of decks.
- New Cards and Table designs to celebrate the holiday spirit!
- Performance improvements - the ​game is smaller and faster than ever!

We love reading your 5-star reviews:
"Great fun will be a new favorite :) - You can win ... gives clues to beginners too!" - Mardidel
" Addictive and great. Thumbs UP!" - Shirley

Have Fun!

And as always, if you like the game please give us 5 Stars!

Hello Solitaire Fans!

We hope you enjoy playing this game as much as we do!

In this release:
1. New and exciting decks.
2. Minor Bug Fixes.
3. Improved performance.

As always, if you enjoy the game rate us 5 stars, and if not please send us some feedback so we can make the game even better.

Thanks.

2. Minor Bug Fixes.

As always, if you enjoy the game rate us 5 stars, and if not please send us some feedback so we can make the game even better.

Thanks.

Hello Solitaire Fans!

We hope you enjoy playing this game as much as we do!

In this release:
1. New and exciting decks.
2. Share love with the new and amazing st Valentine back-cards!
3. Language options, now you can play in Japanese (日本語)
4. Improved performance. Now the game is smother and lighter than ever.

We love to read your reviews:

""Time Well Spent
Best game ! I installed this game recently and am hooked. Great game to relax with.""

""I really enjoy playing this game it posses a good challenge for me.""

""I love playing this solitaire! It's really relaxing.""

As always, if you enjoy the game rate us 5 stars, and if not please send us some feedback so we can make the game even better.

Thanks.

Hello Solitaire fans!
Thank-you all for playing and for the amazing feedback. We always listen to our fans!

What’s New in this version?

- New languages! Enjoy your solitaire in German, French, and Spanish!
- More fun and challenging decks and Daily Challenges.
- You can now play Daily Challenges from up to 12 months ago!
- Hint system has been improved.
- New seasonal Easter card backs :slightly_smiling_face:
- Bug fixes and performance improvements to make the game load and run even faster.

We love reading some of your 5 star reviews:

“This is actually a great set up for solitaire!!!! it puts your mind to a challenge when you are up all night and needing a game to play, pick this!! It will help pass your time quickly!!!” *****

“I love the challenge of this particular game also the card backs & table colors are awesome” *****

“I like playing this to relax.” *****

Thanks again for playing, and as always If you have any suggestion please let us know at solitaire_support@tripledotstudios.com
Keep Shuffeling!

Hello Solitaire Lovers!
We have a shiny new version for you all, filled with small improvements which you have requested.
What’s New in this version?

- More fun and challenging decks and Daily Challenges.
- Additional table backgrounds!
- Tweaks to the Vegas scoring system.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements to make the game load and run even faster.

We love reading some of your 5 star reviews:

“I had no idea how to play and by playing it I learned u can learn to it’s an amazing game come and play” ***** - James

“I love this game and the app is fantastic. So much fun for a bit of downtime.” ***** - Denise

“I never get tired of playing this game I love it” ***** - Mary

Thanks again for playing, and as always If you have any suggestion please let us know at solitaire_support@tripledotstudios.com
Keep Playing!

Hello Solitaire Lovers!
We have a shiny new version for you all, filled with small improvements which you have requested.
What’s New in this version?
- More fun and challenging decks and Daily Challenges.
- Additional table backgrounds!
- Bug fixes and Tweaks to the Vegas scoring system.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements to make the game load and run even faster.

We love reading some of your 5 star reviews:

“I never get tired of playing this game I love it” ***** - Mary

Thanks again for playing, and as always If you have any suggestion please let us know at solitaire_support@tripledotstudios.com
Keep Playing!

We're back with a new update to the very best Solitaire app!

:hearts: Dress up your game:

We've added a host of new customisation options! Download your favourite card and table designs and mix and match to get your game looking just the way you like! We've even got a new, old-school animation to celebrate your victories.

:clubs: A lighter app:

Our app is now smaller than ever before, to free up space on your device.

:diamonds: Game Tweaks:

In games with standard scoring, you can now switch between Draw-1 and Draw-3 modes mid-game.

:spades: Bug Fixes:

We've been working hard to eliminate bugs and keep the game stable.

We hope you like the new update! Let us know your thoughts at solitaire-support@tripledotstudios.com

Hello, brilliant Solitaire players!
There's a brand new update to the best Solitaire app! We've added some new features and improved the app's performance to give you the most fun experience.

SHUFFLE FEATURE

Stuck with no moves? This doesn't have to be Game Over! Now you can refresh your game by shuffling the face-down cards and carrying on.

IMPROVED HINTS

We've been hard at work improving the logic of the Hint feature, so the app will always point you to a good move you can make.

PERFORMANCE IMPROVEMENTS

Our team has been smoothing out the game's animations and fixing small bugs to make the game as reliable as possible.

We hope you like the new update! If you have any questions or issues, please contact us at solitaire-support@tripledotstudios.com
Bug Fixes and Improvements.
Bug Fixes and Improvements.
Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and improvements

Bug fixes and small improvements:
- Better support for iOS13 and iPadOS
- Resolved issue where game would rotate incorrectly on some iPad devices.
Bug fixes and small improvements.

We've been hard at work making Solitaire at least 14.8% better!

This new version of Solitaire has an improved layout for tablet users, and optimised performance for mobile phone users. We have also squashed an annoying bug that was affecting the Daily Challenge.


We hope you love it even more than before!

We’ve made some small improvements under the hood in order to make the game experience even smoother and all the more relaxing. As always, it’s no-fuss Solitaire, with a beautiful design that lets you simply play!
